summary:

education.description: Extensive and broad-spectrum preparation with courses crossing over Electronics, Mechanics and Electrical machines, with stronger focus on Software Engineering and Automatic Control.

Allievi Honors Program. Courses focused on Modern Economic theory and methods using Advanced Statistics and Mathematics.

Thesis: "L1 Adaptive Control and Polynomial Trajectory Planning for Economic Applications", it uses engineering tools from control theory re-adapted for economic purposes.

education.degree_name: Excellence Programme in Business and Innovation
education.description:
Politecnico di Torino and Politecnico di Milano Honour College, restricted to the best 150 applicants to the M.Sc. in Engineering, Architecture and Design, coming from ~20 different countries.

It offers a 2-year training aimed at developing interdisciplinary, team-work and leadership skills.

Courses based on the Electronics and Software Engineering degree plus some characteristics like bio-electronics, human physiology, biomedical instrumentation, signal processing and data analysis, bio-materials.

education.degree_name: Excellence Programme in ICT and Business
education.description:
University of Genoa Honour College, consortium between the University of Genoa and ICT companies. Restricted to the best 15 applicants to the B.Sc. in Engineering (Electronics, Software and Biomedical) and Computer Science. 

It offers a 3-year training aimed at developing skills in corporate and organizational, socio-economic and scientific-technical areas.
Main subjects: Physical Chemistry, Chemical Analyses, Organic Chemistry, Industrial Chemical Technologies

projects.title: Smart Taillight for Automotive Applications
projects.description:
The goal of this Project was the development of a smart automotive taillight able to adjust light emission based on weather conditions, like night/day, fog and rain, enhancing driving safety in low visibility.
The main partner of the Project is OLSA Group.

profile_positions.description:
Joined when headcount of ~500 employees, ~3M retail customers and ~3K business customers.
Direct reporting to the CEO, involved in different tasks tackled with SQL Data Analysis:

- set KPIs, KRIs and build dashboards

- define / improve Internal Processes and procedures

- restructure departments for Business Expansion

- Hire for key positions 


Responsibilities in the following areas: 
- Support departments (Retail, Business, Complaints, KYC, Tech, Transfer Investigation)
- Retail Product teams
- HR department

Hired for: 
Head of Retail Product, Head of Finance, Head of Business Sales, Executive Associates, Business Analysts, Recruiters

Other, actively involved in:
- team performance evaluation of the entire company
- internal audits for retail support and retail product departments
